footer.description: Find the perfect online tutor for you, worldwide within seconds. Or become a teacher yourself and earn money.

banner.text: Get FREE education via the brainstr Social Program (no requirements)

index.headline: Find your perfect online tutor
index.textbox-placeholder: Subject, you want to improve in

highlights.1-text: All teachers are students or recent graduates from leading World Universities and schools. They are full of energy and know what are the student's challenges.
highlights.2-text: brainstr provides you engaging and interesting lessons. Interactive tools will make your tutoring sessions educational and enjoyable.
highlights.3-text: Want to learn a language with a native speaker? Or learn a new subject which you don't have at school? With brainstr you can connect with teachers from anywhere.
highlights.4-text: All our lessons are online - study from any place on the world, at any time you want.

banner-1.headline: Homeschooling just became cool
banner-1.text: Get the education you deserve. With interactive lessons and teachers, who are highly motivated and care about your progress and success. brainstr is providing you with all the tools you need to become a rockstar from your living room.

banner-2.headline: Start growing beyond yourself
banner-2.text: You don't need to waste time with mediocre teachers and laggy video chats. brainstr gives you everything you need so you can concentrate on changing your education for the better, start growing and exceed your goals. What are you waiting for?

banner-3.headline: Your life. Your education. Your schedule.
banner-3.text: Education should be a significant part of your live, but you have a lot more going on. We understand that! That's why you decide when and for how long you spent time studying on brainstr so your have the perfect live-work balance.

cta-1.headline: Teach and Study - that's brainstr
cta-1.text: With brainstr you can find the perfect tutor for online lessons for you. However, you can become a teacher yourself and start earning money from home teaching students.

head.subheadline: üëã Interactive platform where students teach students
head.headline:
What do you
want to learn?
head.subtext: Tutors all %s around the world %s. Lessons %s start at %s

shortinfo.1-text: Choose from a variety of teachers for your 1-on-1 lesson and discuss and learn exactly the topic, you need help with.
shortinfo.2-text: We implemented a secure payment flow to protect your money - and you keep in budget by paying only by lessons.
shortinfo.3-text: Safe distance learning - without mask and risks. Great education despite the pandemic with brainstr.

blocks.text-1: Brainstrs tutors are students of leading world universities and best high school students.  They love to study, pass exams with a high score and are engaged in social activities.
blocks.text-2: Our tutors have coped with the difficulties of study and admission on their own.  They speak the same language as students, can clearly explain the material and, by their example, inspire to learn.
blocks.headline-3: Brainstr checks the quality of all lessons
blocks.text-3: We conduct interviews with each tutor on brainstr, check grades and take feedback from their teachers.  If you don't like the lesson - we can refund your money.
blocks.text-4:
We aim to teach in a way that our students can become tutors themselves and earn money for their development.

We invite the best students to our team and conduct online tutoring training.

howto.headline: As easy as %s1-2-3%s
howto.step1: Sign up and choose a tutor based on your goals
howto.step2: Deposit money to your account and choose a convenient time
howto.step3: The tutor meets with the student in the brainstr virtual and interactive classroom and conducts the lesso at the choosen time

whattutorsprovide.headline: What do %stutors help%s with?
whattutorsprovide.3: üë©‚Äçüíª Explain a difficult topic if the child missed something
whattutorsprovide.4: üë©üèº‚Äçüé® Help to master a subject that is not in school: for example, a new language or advanced coding
whattutorsprovide.5: üßëüèª‚Äçüíº Share the experience of entering a good university

qa.text-1: You pay the cost of the lesson which is defined by tutors and 20% commission for Brainstr services. The final cost of the lesson is indicated on tutor profile and usually around 6-15 euros.

principals.headline: Our %sprincipals%s
principals.text-1: We believe in the power of peer-to-peer learning, when the teacher is in the same position as the students.¬†¬†There is no place for instructions, orders and punishments and both student and teacher are learning. Our tutors are constantly developing and advancing their knowledge while working with students.
principals.headline-2: Every student is unique and has potential to grow
principals.text-2: Different people learn in different ways and individual work with our tutors helps to find the best way and pace of learning for each student.
principals.headline-3: Care about results and long-term goals
principals.text-3: It is important for us to help children and parents get a quality education and have more opportunities for a stable future.¬†¬†Our tutors not only fix high-level issue with knowledge, but also share with students tips how to learn better, so they can become tutors themselves - and earn money for better education

teachers.infotext: Online %s tutors available. Have you ever been bored in your class in school? Or feeling like the pace is too fast and you wish teachers could explain more details and show more examples? Or your classmates do not want to study and it is hard to find someone to learn from? Every person who‚Äôs in the process of learning %s has a specific goal in mind. If classes are boring in school and it is hard to prepare for exams with formal education, someone who understands your challenge and can clearly explain the subject is probably exactly what you need. Private tutors on our platform are students who study know how to be more successful in school and they can help you to reach your goals with 15 euro or less per class. Learn subjects at your own pace, get your questions answered when you need them. Our teachers are highly motivated, energetic, and attentive - they can help you to identify what you are good at and what are the white spots. The best part that private tutors here are just like you - students themselves, that's why they can quickly identify your challenges and explain %s interactively and clearly. Choose a tutor and schedule a trial class to start preparing for exams and improving your %s today and find the inspiring person to learn from!

teacher.book-success-text: Your lesson request has been sent.
teacher.book-note: The price will be blocked after booking but only transfered after the lesson.

verified.tooltip: This tutor is verified by brainstr

booking.headline: Secure Checkout
booking.safety: It‚Äôs safe to pay on brainstr. All transactions are protected by SSL encryption and brainstr buyer protection service.
booking.pm-card: Pay via %s online payment %s Credit card, SEPA Debit, Apple & Google Pay
booking.pm-sp: Book via the %s brainstr Social Program %s Learn more %s about how we provide free education
booking.socialprogram-tooltip: We use donations to provide free lessons and education to children and people without financial possibilities.

confirmation.headline: Congratulations üöÄ
confirmation.text: You scheduled your lesson and got the first step to improve yourself. Make sure to go to brainstr 10 minutes before your lesson starts. You will see an invitation on the website to join our virtual classroom, where your lesson will take place.
confirmation.text2: Please feel free to reach out to us any time you have a question at

guarantee.headline: Learn with 100% satisfaction guarantee
guarantee.text: If your lesson does not take place, or you are not satisfied with the tutor, we will provide you with a free replacement to another tutor of your choice or offer you a full refund.

sidebar.processing-fee-tooltip: Processing fees are charged by third party payment providers in order to transfer the funds from your account to our escrow and ultimately to the tutor after the lesson is completed.
sidebar.lesson-cancellation-tooltip: You may cancel the lesson for free up to 24 hours before the start time. The tutor may charge the full lesson price after this time.

teacherSettings.challenge-del-subject-text: Are you sure you want to delete this subject?

teacherSettings.social-program-text: With the brainstr Social Program we provide lessons for children that cannot afford or do not have access to education. You can help us spread knowledge to everyone around the globe.

balance.footnote-1: Your final payment will be made in EUR.
balance.footnote-2: All currency conversions are estimates, may vary and are not binding.
balance.footnote-3: All sales are final, purchases may be refunded for brainstr balance only.

blog.headline: Blog

cta.title: Become a brainstr today!
cta.text: With brainstr you will find your highly motivated online tutor to improve your skills and get you ready for life. Furthermore, you can start teaching on brainstr and earn money from home.

brainstr-as-tutor.headline: Become a Tutor with brainstr
brainstr-as-tutor.subheadline:
Teach online and earn money.
brainstr provides everything you need to get you started within minutes.

1.headline: Start Today
1.text: Register for free, fill out your tutor profile and you are ready to have your first online lesson.

2.headline: Work from Home
2.text: All you need for brainstr is a device connected to the internet with a webcam and microphone.

3.headline: Your timetable
3.text: Be your own boss and decide when you want to teach on brainstr. Take breaks when you need them.

4.headline: Low Commission
4.text: We offer you very competetive commission rates in the industry of as low as 20%.

5.headline: No monthly costs
5.text: We don't charge you for any services on brainstr except a commission per completed lesson.

6.headline: Worldwide Students
6.text: Our students come from every nation on the world. Be ready for interesting students and new experiences.

7.headline: Interactive Tools
7.text: brainstr provides you with the tools for awesome lessons - interactive, fun and engaging.

8.headline: Inspired Team
8.text: Our team is working super hard to make brainstr better every single day. Tell us what you like or dislike!

1.headline: Have awesome lessons with brainstr
1.text: Our interactive virtual classroom on brainstr helps you in every way creating interesting and interactive lessons to keep your students engaged and happy. The platform is super simple to use and works on every device.

2.headline: Customize your profile
2.text: With our customizable profiles you have the advantage to stand out of the crowd and attract more students to your profile. Our Interface is designed for high conversion rates so you can be sure that you won't wait long for your first lessons and students.

3.headline: Adjustable timetable
3.text: Enter your weekly timetable to plan ahead. Your students will only be able to book lessons within your specified times. You can change your timetable at any time.

4.headline: Pricing is up to you
4.text: Pricing of your lessons on brainstr is up to you and super flexibel. Decide for each subject and time interval, how much you want to charge your students. And of course, you can always change it afterwards with just a few clicks.

5.headline: Get paid at your will
5.text:
Payouts can be done as often as you like during a month.
We will send you your money depending on your location and currency either via SEPA wire transfer, PayPal or Bank Transfer (Russia).
The payout threshold is as little as 20‚Ç¨ ().

virtual-classroom.headline: Virtual Classroom
virtual-classroom.subheadline:
The simplest way to take online tutoring lessons.
Fully integrated, no setup required. Works on every device.

1.headline: Works in every modern browser
1.text: Join with one click via brainstr the virtual classroom - no installation needed.

2.headline: Whiteboard & Screen Share
2.text: Interactive lessons with a shared virtual witheboard or screen sharing for engaging lessons.

3.headline: High Quality Audo & Video
3.text: Newest technology with high quality video and audio makes every lesson on brainstr like it was in person.

4.headline: Automated Lesson Management
4.text: Lessons monitoring for completion or no shows gives you a maximum of safety and a fast refund if needed.

1.headline: Have engaging lessons with brainstr
1.text: Brainstr's virtuell classroom is way more than just a video chat. Have awesome lessons with our interactive whiteboard, where student and teacher can work out concepts together just like standing next to each other.

1.headline: Excellent Tutors
1.text: Highly motivated and educated tutors are waiting on brainstr. Student-to-Student tutoring for your personal growth.

2.headline: COVID-19 safe
2.text: Safe distance learning - without mask and risks. Great education despite circumstances with brainstr.

3.headline: Data Protection
3.text: All tutoring lessons on brainstr are end-to-end encrypted. Highest data protection standards are applied.

brainstr-as-student.headline: Online Tutoring with brainstr
brainstr-as-student.text:
Take online lessons with tutors all over the world.
Get help with homework, prepare for exams, learn a new language and much more with brainstr.

1.headline: Quick Setup
1.text: Sign up, top up your balance and you can book your first lesson. Start now in only 2 minutes.

2.headline: Take lessons anytime
2.text: As long as you have your laptop and an internet connection, you can take a lesson on brainstr.

3.headline: International Community
3.text: We have tutors all around the world, speaking any language you can think of. Explore them now.

4.headline: No Lesson Fees
4.text: We love providing education opportunity to you. That's why we won't charge you fees for lessons.

5.headline: General Tutoring
5.text: You want to learn a complete new subject? Or just want to improve your general skills in a known one?

6.headline: Homework Assistance
6.text: Help from parents is nice, but with brainstr you can get real help for your homework.

7.headline: Learn with native speakers
7.text: No other way is more effective to learn a foreign language. Let's start speaking to native speakers.

8.headline: Exam Preperation
8.text: Don't worry about exams anymore! Brainstr tutors will prepare you perfectly for those.

1.headline: Virtual Classroom for engaging lessons
1.text: All lessons on brainstr are done in the integrated virtual classroom, which provides you with everything you need for an awesome tutoring lesson. Works in every browser, no download needed.

2.headline: Find your perfect Tutor
2.text: Finding a tutor is now as simple as signing up for brainstr. You can define with our filters your requirements and you get immediately shown suited tutors who will be happy to have a first lesson with you.

3.headline: Easy & secure lesson booking
3.text: Top up your brainstr balance with one of our many secure payment options. Therafter you can book lessons with just a few clicks. It's never been easier to book tutoring lessons.

4.headline: Become a tutor yourself
4.text: Register as tutor, start teaching students and earn money for every lesson you hold. We have all the tools and education on brainstr for you ready to get started.

5.headline: Dispute & Resolution Centre
5.text: In case at anytime something went not as planned - we're here for you! All lessons on brainstr are part of our Dispute & Resolution Policy. We will handle your case and clarify the situation.

settings.socialprogram-text: We can provide you with free lessons in case you don't have access or currently not the financial possibilities. Lessons are being held by volunteering teachers or being payed by the brainstr Social Fund.

social-program.headline: Free education with the brainstr Social Program
social-program.subheadline: Providing students with free online teaching
social-program.t1: The brainstr Social Program provides lessons to students who can't afford it themselves. If you can't afford the lessons, don't worry, we will take care of it. Your lessons will be held by volunteering teachers or we pay using the brainstr Social Program Fund.
social-program.st1: Students that can't afford lessons sign up and simply enroll with one click in the program. We provide those students with volunteering teachers or, if no suitable is available, we pay for the lesson using the brainstr Social Fund. %s Teachers on brainstr can opt-in to give volunteering lessons to students next to giving regular payed lessons. It's their choice and they can change this setting anytime.
social-program.st2: Contributions from our partners, people, students and teachers are all going into the fund.%sThe fund is being used to pay for the operational costs of the project - the infrastructure, employees making this project possible and teachers.
social-program.students-text: We provide students with no financial possibilities with free education - online lessons with our teachers on brainstr. Simply sign up and book your first lesson - either with a volunteering teacher, or we pay for the lesson using the brainstr Social Fund.
social-program.teachers-text: Help raising education levels across the globe with teaching as a volunteer for Social Students on brainstr. You deliver lessons for free to children who couldn't otherwise afford to be taught.
social-program.partners-text: The brainstr Social Program cannot live without the amazing help of our partners and contributors. In order to provide our free education for children in need, we rely on donations from companies, organisations, people, our students and teachers. Only together we can keep this important project alive.

cta.headline: Building the %s future of education
cta.text: We at brainstr are empowered by the vision to eduacte children around the globe, no matter how there financial possibilities might be. Education is a human right we are fighting for.

social-program-student.headline: Get tutoring lessons%s- even if you can't pay
social-program-student.subheadline: Teach for free or receive compensation from our brainstr Social Fund to improve our children future.
social-program-student.social-student-option: Enroll in the brainstr Social Program
social-program-student.t1: The brainstr Social Program provides lessons to students who can't afford it themselves. If you can't afford the lessons, don't worry, we will take care of it. Your lessons will be held by volunteering teachers or we pay using the brainstr Social Fund.
social-program-student.t2: Find your perfect online teacher on brainstr. Select according to your requirements, set lessons at times that work for you. Learn on the brainstr platform using our virtual classroom and secure payment processing.
social-program-student.cta-text: Be part of our vision providing access to free education to all children around the world.%sWe are excited about the future we are building, are you ready to join?

social-program-teacher.headline: Teaching Students that don't have access to education
social-program-teacher.subheadline: Teach for free or receive compensation from our brainstr Social Fund to improve our children future.
social-program-teacher.t1: The brainstr Social Program provides lessons to students who can't afford it themselves. You can either teach on a voluntary basis or we pay you from the brainstr Social Funds. This fund is filled by donations.
social-program-teacher.t2: We provide you all the tools you need to start. Sign up, fill out your profile and wait for the first student booking a lesson. You get paid right after each regular lesson that is not done for the brainstr Social Program.
social-program-teacher.cta-text: Be part of our vision providing access to free education to all children around the world.%sWe are excited about the future we are building, are you ready to join?

social-program-partner.headline:
Making education accessible.
Creating Futures.
social-program-partner.subheadline: Brainstr Social Program helps children get the education we think they deserve while at the same time we build jobs for teachers worldwide.
social-program-partner.t1: Students profit from the brainstr Social Program if they cannot afford tutoring lessons by themselves or don't have access to schools. We provide those students with the tools and guidance required and pay for their lessons.
social-program-partner.t2: We help teachers to get back into a job where they can provide for themselves and their family. We are also working on our own program to train people to become teachers on brainstr.
social-program-partner.t3: Bringing high quality education to everyone - that is brainstr's vision. No matter of heritage, location or the current situation, with our brainstr teachers we want to give every child sufficient education to be successfull in life.
social-program-partner.t4: If you are interested in a partnership or a special contribution, please reach out to us directly at %s to discuss in detail.%sWe are constantly looking into all directions to secure funding for our Social Program and progressing with our vision.
social-program-partner.cta-text: Be part of our vision providing access to free education to all children around the world.%sWe are excited about the future we are building, are you ready to join?
